name: DANIEL HE
profile_summary: Skilled Full-Stack Software Engineer with expertise in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Kotlin**, and **React**. Proficient in database management with **PostgreSQL** and experienced with real-time data processing using **Kafka**. I excel in developing and deploying applications within **Kubernetes** and **Docker** environments, ensuring streamlined **CI/CD** practices. My frontend skills include **TypeScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, enabling the creation of dynamic and responsive web interfaces. Additionally, I leverage cloud services such as **AWS** and infrastructure as code with **Terraform** to enhance application performance. Recognized for delivering impactful solutions in the healthcare, eCommerce, and finance sectors, I am dedicated to building scalable and user-centric applications while maintaining a focus on clean, efficient code.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Java (Spring Boot)** and **Kotlin** to design a microservices-based Clinical Patient Management System (CPMS), achieving **95%** accuracy in patient tracking and enhancing patient adherence through automated reminders.
Developed and optimized RESTful APIs using **Spring Data JPA**, improving data accuracy by **40%** and ensuring secure EHR integration with **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**.
Designed intuitive UI/UX for the pathway builder leveraging **React**, **HTML**, and **CSS**, successfully reducing user completion time by **30%**.
Implemented a reliable notification system using **RabbitMQ**, achieving a **99%** timely alert delivery rate.
Established sophisticated CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitHub Actions** and **AWS CodePipeline**, leading to an **80%** reduction in deployment times.
Containerized microservices using **Docker**, facilitating seamless deployment processes across staging and production environments.
Managed cloud services on **AWS EKS (Kubernetes)** with **Terraform**, ensuring **99.9%** uptime and optimizing load handling through **Redis** caching.
Conducted unit testing with **JUnit**, **Mockito**, and end-to-end testing using **Jasmine**, **Selenium**, and **Protractor** to ensure software quality.

• Developed backend services using **Java** (Spring Boot) and **Node.js**, resulting in a **25%** reduction in response times for ticketing and customer support.
• Designed a notification system with **Kafka** for real-time alerts, achieving a **98%** timely notification rate for critical issues.
• Created a customer insights dashboard using **Vue.js** and **D3.js**, which improved resolution rates by **20%**.
• Automated testing and deployment utilizing **Jenkins** and **AWS CodePipeline**, ensuring a consistent **CI/CD** release process.
• Deployed the platform on **AWS EC2** with **Docker** and **Terraform**, effectively cutting infrastructure setup time by **50%**.

• Developed robust backend REST APIs using **Java (Spring Boot)** and **PostgreSQL**, achieving **98%** uptime.
• Created dynamic frontend applications with **React** and **TypeScript**, improving load times by **40%**.
• Led extensive testing initiatives with **JUnit** and **Mockito**, successfully reducing bug rates by **30%**.
• Optimized application performance through modern techniques such as lazy loading and code splitting, leading to significant enhancements in load times.
• Deployed scalable solutions globally utilizing **AWS CloudFront** and **S3**, ensuring low-latency access across multiple regions.
• Implemented continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) practices to streamline development processes and deployment cycles.

skills:
Programming Languages:
	Java, JavaScript (TypeScript), Kotlin, Go, Python, SQL, Swift

**Backend Frameworks:**
	Spring Boot, Spring Security, Hibernate, Node.js, Express.js, JPA, Kafka, RabbitMQ

**Frontend Frameworks:**
	React, Vue.js, Angular, Pixi.js, Redux, Next.js, React Router, Material-UI, Ant Design, D3.js, Webpack, Babel, Jest, HTML, CSS

**API Technologies:**
	RESTful API design

**Serverless and Cloud Functions:**
	AWS Lambda, API Gateway

**Databases:**
	MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis, MongoDB

**DevOps:**
	Docker, Kubernetes (AWS EKS), Jenkins, GitHub Actions, Terraform, AWS CodePipeline, CI/CD

**Cloud & Infrastructure:**
	AWS (EKS, RDS, CloudFront, S3), Git, CloudWatch, ELK Stack

**Other:**
	Microservices, Infrastructure as Code (IaC), Data structures and algorithms, Agile/Scrum methodologies, JUnit, Mockito, Jasmine, Selenium, Protractor
